title: Lawngtlaiah National Voter’s Day Hman ani
content:
4220/2025-2026

Lawngtlai 29th January 2926 :My Bharat ( NYK) , Ministry of Youth Affairs & Sports , Govt. of India bul tumin National Voter’s day Govt. Lawngtlai College ah hman ani. Hemi hun hi Pu Collin Hlychho, Election Officer, Lawngtlai chu Khuallian niin a hman pui.

Democracy ram kan nih angin Vote nei thei chu rilru fim tak hmang thin tur leh vote nei thar le lawmpuina thilpek a hlan bawk. He hun hi Dr David V. Khiangte, Associate Professor in kaihruaiin, Voters Pledge te neih ani a. Govt. Lawngtlai College zirlai ten pledge lain hun hlimawm tak an hmang. Lawmthu sawiin, Dr Ramthanpuia Pachuau, Assistant Professor chuan Democracy ram lian ber a awm kan nih angin, voters zawng zawng te ram tha zawk siamna kawngah huaisenna nen ke pen turin kal khawmte a nge.

He hunah hian Khuallian Pu Collin Hylchho’n zirlai vote nei thar te lawmpuina thil pek hlannin, vote vawikhatmah la thlak lo te fuihin, vote nei zawng zawng te vote thlak ngaipawimawh turin a chah bawk. Inkhawmna hunh man zawng hian College Auditorium kawt anga National Highway thleng Rally neih leh ani a. Banner leh Poster te kengin zirlaiten  leh thalaiten hun an hmang leh ani.
